THE UNIVERSITY OF TENNESSEE
DIVISION DF UNIVERSITY EXTENSION
BOX 8450, UNIVERSITY STATION
KNOXVILLE
RADIO AND TELEVISION SERVICES
RADIO STATION WUOT
January 10, 1955
JAN 12 1965
A M
j,2|8|4|6|(S
i
TO : John Holt, Waldo Abbot, Ed Slack, Hugh Mix
PROM : Jack Westbrook, Chm., Network Acceptance Subcommittee
SUBJECT: "Contour Country"
1* Subcommittee votes "no," two to one. Slack and Mix vote
"no;" Westbrook votes yes.
2. Views of Slack and Mix are already known to other people
involved*
3* Westbrookfe reasons are as follows:
1) I vote yes mainly on the theory that "what happens
anywhere else*....etc."
2) While comparisons with past programming and similar
efforts is not completely valid, I do think there is
some value in making such comparisons. In this case,
I think the program is equally as valid and as well
done as other series offered on the net. It is in¬
finitely superior to a number of other "grant" series*
3) Expanding reason number one, with a somewhat different
angle—I think that, while the program is somewhat lo¬
calized, there are some lessons to be gained by people
in other parts of the country.
